item.title: Logistic Regression
item.description: Function Set We want to find $P_{w,b}(C_1|x)$ $P_{w, b}(C_1|x) = \sigma(z)$ $ z = w \cdot x + b = \sum\limits_iw_ix_i + b $ function set: $f_{w, b}(x) = P_{w, b}(C_1|x)$ // including all different w and b Goodness of a Function 取minima的 对象写成一个function，这个fun
